import React from 'react' import literals from './literals' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import './index.sass' function ResultsLine({ lang, stop, onFav, favs, error }) { const { title1, lin, dir,back } = literals[lang] return

{title1} {stop[0].stop_id}: {stop[0].stop_name}

    { stop.map(({ line, t_in_min, color_line, dest_line }) => { let style = { color: `#${color_line}`, }; return

  • {lin} {line} {dir} {dest_line}

    {t_in_min} min

    • }) }
{error}
} export default ResultsLine
